items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 32)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 33!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 95 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 20!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 30 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.comment: Definitely good stuff. Thought about trying demons surround me, but decided to go with a lower ABV stout instead.

items.badge_description: Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 15 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more to unlock Level 4.

items.checkin_comment: Not my favorite but can appreciate the style. Will go up to a 3.6

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three Thursdays in a 30 day period!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 75 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 16!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 195 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 40.
Total Beer Domination. We’re not worthy. That's over 200 different brews!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 31)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 32!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren't you? That's 10 different Lagers! Try 5 more to unlock Level 3.

items.checkin_comment: Definitely a different take on a New England IPA.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 125 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 26!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 22!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 30 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 7.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 90 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 19!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 60 distinct venues!

items.comment: Thanks, I'll be sure to pick up some stuff to bring back.

items.badge_description: You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 190 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 39.

You're definitely getting after it now! How about another challenge? After your next workout, reward yourself with Slightly Mighty, a low calorie beer that tastes like something other than a light beer. Slightly Mighty is a true indie craft beer with all the character of a world class IPA, but with only 95 calories, 3.6g carbs, 1g protein and 0g fat per 12oz serving. Learn more!

Raise a can to toast the summer with Dogfish Head's all-new Off­-Centered Activity Box. A summer-centric variety 12-pack of cans that features four of our most sessionable sippers, including fan-favorites like SeaQuench Ale and Namaste White, and two new offerings - SuperEIGHT and Slightly Mighty. The Off-Centered Activity Box also doubles as a functional cooler-just pop it open and add ice!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 30)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 31!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 95 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 20!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 25 check-ins with a photo.

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 100 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 21!

Hazy and white like a winter storm, but best enjoyed on a warm sunny day. This specific style of wheat beer brings with it a subtle mix of spices and hops, giving it a distinct flavor with little bitterness. That's 5 different beers categorized as a Witbier. Try 5 more for Level 2!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 10 different beers with the style of IPA - New England (Imperial or Single), Pale Ale - New England or IPA - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 30 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 7!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 120 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 25!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 185 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 38.

items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 30!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three Thursdays in a 30 day period!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 70 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 15!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 60 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 13!

It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 15 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited. Try 5 more for Level 4.

items.comment: Yep, great lemon flavor. Definitely was refreshing on a hot summer day.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 85 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 18!
It's time for Summer! It's that time of year where you hit the beach and crack open your favorite Summer brew! That's at least 5 different Summer beers try 5 more for Level 2!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 25 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 6.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 180 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 37.

items.checkin_comment: A little too much grapefruit compared to the passion fruit.
